.@Gus4NY I'm sure he thought of that but I think before they let him do anything he was whisked off 2 City Hall to give a speech #msnbcchat
@AmandaHeisey I think one of the biggest issues we are not hearing about is Kidnaping and trafficking of women worldwide. #msnbcchat
.@AmandaHeisey Find a cause learn about how you can support or get involved n add your voice to the change you hope to create. #msnbcchat
.@NeoJC He actually loved to eat Samp and Oxtail. He also enjoyed tripe as well #msnbcchat
.@SteveSosna4NY we all have a voice which we can use to impact our communities and shine a light on others who need our support #msnbcchat
.@BryanWeakland I hope through my work and daily actions. I'm supporting orgs like @UNAIDS & @GlblCtzn whose work inspires me. #msnbcchat
.@acmaule it was remarkably normal he loved the reading the newspaper or meeting with Friends and having family around. #msnbcchat
.@ericlsawyer  LGBT communities in Africa are being targeted by some countries. We all have a role to play in changing this #msnbcchat
.@ericlsawyer I've made HIV/AIDS a focus because I personally have been affected by it's impact. #msnbcchat
.@TylerClementi I think we can each play a role in defining freedom in our communities by promoting tolerance and understanding. #msnbcchat
